testcase.classname: Feature to test the login functionality of Zero Banking Application
testcase.name: Check signin button exists on Home Page of Application
testcase.system-out: Given User launch the browser...............................................passed When User open the Zero Banking Application.................................passed Then Signin button should be displayed......................................passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test the login functionality of Zero Banking Application
testcase.name: Login successful with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User launch a browser.................................................passed And Click signin button on home page of application.........................passed When User enter the 'username' and 'password'...............................passed And click Signin button.....................................................passed Then User should be redirected to the home page of user.....................passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test the Logout page functionality
testcase.name: Logged in user be able to logout
testcase.system-out: Given User click the username dropdown button...............................passed When User click the logout button...........................................passed Then User check the sigin button on current page............................passed
